mapper.select: select st_code from DS_STORAGE_LIST where b_code = #{b_code} and s_kind = #{s_kind} and usable = 'y' and borrower_id is null and rownum = 1
mapper.update: update DS_STORAGE_LIST set usable = 'n', borrower_id = case when borrower_id is null then '에러' else '일부러에러를발생시키기위한값' end where st_code = #{st_code}
update DS_STORAGE_LIST set borrower_id = null, usable = 'y' where st_code = {st_code}
mapper.select: select count(*) from DS_STORAGE_LIST where substr(st_code, 1, 2) = #{code}
mapper.insert: insert into DS_STORAGE_LIST(st_code, b_code, s_kind) values (#{st_code}, #{br}, #{s_kind})
